attributes.action: stop the My Telegraph Moderators from continually removing witty, urbane and slightly controversial  posts due to their obvious lack of a sense of humour...
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It’s time for action! Civil liberties are being eroded bit by bit. It’s time to strike back in the name of free speech! Please moderate with common sense, forethought and a little tlc…. Many thanks.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
